text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
That was an excellent meal! Are we all prepared? 
Now, before our lunch break ends——

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Light O-san, we are about to begin! 
I ask that you wrap up your little solo practice session.

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text:
Light O-chan, you sure finished lunch fast…! 
Though I don't remember seeing you chew at all, are you going to be okay…?

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: I am okay. Ten minutes ago my throat hurt and five minutes after that my chest hurt and it was so bad I wanted to roll around on the ground in pain but now I am totally okay.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
That doesn't sound "okay" to me! At any rate… 
We only have 30 minutes left before class. Do you think we can manage singing three or four times through?

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text: Oh, hang on! Doesn't your class have a race strategy quiz later, Durandal-chan? My class had one last week, so…

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
T-that's right! In that case, I should set aside ten minutes to review my notes… 
…But what of practice… And the Chorus Fest is so soon…!

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Don't worry, Durandal. 
We've got more than enough time to go through at least once.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
I've got the piano ready. 
So line up, guys. Be confident—— 
And just sing.

text_block_list.name: Everyone
text_block_list.text:
Meet and part, we go by Say hello, wave goodbye 
A scene we'll never see again As we go walking 
Down the little road home

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text:
…!! 
T-that was——

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: That was absolutely beautiful we did it YIPPEEEEE!!

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Indeed…! 
We have come far from where we began… 
We were truly in harmony!

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text: Harmony… Yep! Before I could hear everyone's voice sticking out, but now it's like we're a real chorus!

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: All we need to do now is apply the finishing touches. Then we run straight to victory and win the trip and go play and eat seafood and then go home and pass out with a food coma. Zzz.

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text: We haven't even gone and you're already talking about coming home?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Yup, we're doing great～♪ 
It's all because Kei-chan did all that to help us practice. 
Thanks a ton～

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: It wasn't all me. Your karaoke idea was a big help, Kuu-chan! Besides, the most important part is how hard you all worked.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: Really… Thanks to you guys, we have a really good show on our hands. Hehe… I can't wait to show the kids!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: …Yeah. Hehehe. Me neither.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
So, um, by the way, Kei-chan. 
——Are you free this weekend?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Wait, they came out with a new shake yesterday? And it's sweet potato flavored!? Aw man～ That'd taste amazing, I just know it… Oh. Sorry. Can't be getting distracted just yet.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Oh, I don't mind, really… Actually, Kuu-chan? 
Where are we going, exactly…?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Hmm～? Heehee. I think I'll keep it a secret for a liiiittle bit longer. Just follow me～

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
——Wait, we're buying outfits? 
Is this for the Chorus Fest…?

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: I thought we agreed we'd wear our usual outfits so we wouldn't get too anxious about it… We did, right?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Yeah, we did. That's why, well, I'm not looking to get anything super stylish. It's more of a 'buying new fall clothes' kind of vibe, you know?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Yeah, this isn't what we agreed on, and yeah, we could just wear our normal clothes, buuuut…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
…I just got the urge to buy something new! 
Because… how should I put it… To make memories!

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: Make memories…?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: …We've got class and homework and training and all that, and we're all suuuper busy. But we still managed to make time for each other.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Getting together in an empty classroom, harmonizing with everyone… Well, we were all over the place at the start, but look at us now!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
We even did karaoke on our days off… Hehe. 
…And yeah, some days we just bummed around shooting the breeze at a diner, but…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: It was all really, REALLY fun!

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
! 
…Kuu-chan——

text_block_list.name: HIshi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
So that's why, to make a memory of it… No, I guess the word is 'commemoration'? Oh, it doesn't matter what we call it! 
Just… Won't you please buy some new clothes with me?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
It's not what we promised the others, buuuut… 
They'll be okay with it, I bet! Probably.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: We might not have earned the title, but we're still this team's founding members! So, you know, they'll forgive us, I guess…!

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
…Heh. 
…Hahaha! 
Yeah… I bet they will, Kuu-chan.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
I'll apologize to them with you. 
So let's give them something worth forgiving us over.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
W-what do you think? 
Yikes～ I got so into it I ended up doing my hair…!

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Whoa… It really fits you! 
The design fits perfectly with your usual warm energy,

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Yep. It's perfect. 
Hehe, there's no need to hang your head low, you know? 
Kuu-chan… You're really cute.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
AaAaAaAAaa, please, no more! 
Jeez, Kei-chan, you're so… Y'know, like… 
Making it all about me!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Actually, wait, now it's your turn! 
'Cause I've got my outfit picked out already. Come on, get in there!

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: So, uh… What do you think? Hahaha… The clerk made a whole bunch of recommendations, so I ended up putting all of them on…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle.
text_block_list.text:
…Hmm. 
Nice.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
It's so you! You're so cute! And handsome! 
Your hat and glasses are perfect, and you've got this chic fresh vibe… It's, uh… Nice!!

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
W-What? 
Uh… Kuu-chan?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: It's basically just really good! Ahh, you really are such a feast for the eyes～!! I totally get why you're, like, lowkey popular～!!

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
…………Okay. Sorry. You win. 
It's… hard not to be embarrassed, Kuu-chan.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Hehe～ 
That's what you get.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Phew, we managed to catch the train～! If we missed it we'd probably miss curfew… We sure took a lot of detours, huh～

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Haha, yeah… 
Thanks for sharing so much of your sweet potato shake, Kuu-chan. It sure was nice and sweet…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Oh, don't thank me～ If anything, you were helping me cut calories. …All right, we've got our outfits, so…!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
The Fest's almost here! 
It's going to be so much fun, right, Kei-chan?

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! 
I hope everyone has a good time singing up there.
